name: TICKETS: ERICA FREAS & JAMIE HAY. 16/1/13 @ The magic shop. Melbourne
description:
TICKETS LIMITED TO 45 !!!!!!!! 
Please spread word to friends who want tickets.

YOU WILL RECEIVE A CONFIRMATION EMAIL FROM ME WITHIN 24HRS OF PURCHASE. YOU WON'T BE MAILED A TICKET - JUST THE EMAIL. YOUR NAME WILL BE PLACED ON THE DOOR LIST (so don't stress if you can't print it out!). 

Thursday 16th January 2013 - Doors 9pm.
@ Dane Certificates Magic Shop. 
859a Sydney Rd - Brunswick, Victoria 3056

ERICA FREAS (usa)
https://www.facebook.com/musicofericafreas
& 
JAMIE HAY
https://www.facebook.com/JamieKimHay


***PRE-SALE TICKETS LIMITED TO 45 ON SALE 20TH DECEMBER*** 

In January 2014, Erica Freas (Olympia, WA. USA), from RVIVR will be gracing our shores for the first time with her solo/acoustic/folk project !! 
This is an exciting prelude to RVIVR's first Australian tour, happening in April 2014!

In conjunction with the tour, One Brick Today will be releasing Erica's full length LP 'Belly', on cassette (which will be available for purchase soon), a tour 7", and some other RVIVR related goodies!

LISTEN HERE: http://ericafreas.bandcamp.com/
MORE INFO HERE: One Brick Today 
& http://onebricktoday.wordpress.com/

x OBT/TJ

options.name: erica freas & jamie hay @ the magic shop

name: (brick05) CANINE - 2013 demo cassette
description:
BRICK05 – Canine : 2013 demo cassette.
Canine- hardcore, thrashy, stoner-metal, punk from Sydney Australia.
Members of Shit Weather, Thorax, Glory Hole, Shark Bait, Pure Evil Trio, Circuits etc etc etc!!!
8 songs, 10 mins.


I'M WAITING ON MORE TAPES, CAN ONLY SELL A LIMITED AMOUNT FOR NOW, IT WILL BE BACK SOON IF SOLD OUT!!!

name: (brick04) CIRCUITS - 2009 demo rerelease (Cassette)
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***

BRICK04 : CIRCUITS - 2009 demo cassette re-release.

Circuits - members of Shit Weather, Infinite Void, Bad Taste etc.
LIMITED TO 50 COPIES.
There won't be a repress. 


Taken from Dirty Bird Distro: (because i hate writing descriptions of bands im in)

"Originally released as a cd, one brick today has just rereleased the 2009 circuits demo on cassette. Aside from a split tape featuring these songs + another track released for their south east asia tour, this demo stands as the only recording documenting melbourne based circuits. Sitting at just under 10 minutes, this demo tears through a high intensity rollercoaster melding screamo, raw bursting hardcore and powerful lyrics. With both lead and back up vocals sounding as if they are being ripped and dragged from the core, this demo carries something special, delicate and take no shit fucking furious.Slightly modifying the original artwork, the tapes come in soft cases with lyric sheet inserts and have been strictly limited to a run of only 50. With members of majorca, shit weather, infinite void, this is a must have for ne one building a collection of important australian bands."

name: (brick03) SHARK BAIT - sharktape cassette
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***

BRICK03 : SHARK BAIT - sharktape cassette EP

Sydneys Shark Bait. Catchy melodic pop-punk at its best.
This is their first release, 6 songs, recorded early 2012.
Dance and sing along, then get bummed out that this tape was being released for their last show, and you'll never get to see them play these songs again.
Listen here - http://sharkbait666.bandcamp.com

White tapes, Blue cases.
Limited to 100 copies

name: (brick02) SHIT WEATHER / HIRS - split 7"
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***
For USA orders - bastardtapes.bigcartel.com

BRICK02 - SHIT WEATHER / HIRS - one sided split 7"

SW and +H+ share one side of one record with eight blown out, raw as fuck tracks of brutal thrash and noisy hardcore.
Released for the HIRS Australia tour in March 2012.

Limited to 150 copies.

name: (brick01) HIRS - 'Gaytheism' collection cassette tape
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***
For USA orders - bastardtapes.bigcartel.com

BRICK01 -HIRS "gaytheism" collection - Cassette tape.

For fans of all things thrash, grind, queer, punk, fast, loud and glittery. 
Duo from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania USA- Touring Australia March 2012 - this will be released just in time for their tour.

Collecting their first 69tracks from their first handful of (mostly) our of print releases.

Limited to 150 copies.

http://hirs666.com

name: SHIT WEATHER demo cassette (repress)
description:
Shit Weather demo cassette.
Recorded Jan 2011.
Originally released March 2011.

More copies finally available!
The first pressing sold out pretty fast, but we've done another small run. This is it though, we won't make any more after these are gone!

Black cassette. Red case. Same shit.
http://facebook.com/shitweather

name: HIRS / TOWERS - split POSTCARD FLEXI !!! omg wtf
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - 
onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***

Moved house and found a handful of copies of the long out of print HIRS / Towers split left over from the HIRS 2012 Australian tour.

Yep, it's a postcard flexi 5".
Yep, that is a hairy chest covered in glitter.

This record is hard to play. 
But you can download it for free online, and everyone loves to own ridiculous novelty records.

ALSO, ITS CHEAP AS CHIPS MATE.

MORE INFO HERE -
http://www.discogs.com/HIRS-Towers-Towers-HIRS/release/3096146

xxxxxx

name: THE DIAMOND SEA - slow signal 10"
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***

The Diamond Sea (members of Infinite Void, Deep Heat, Concrete Life, Whitehorse, Circuits, Pneumatic Slaughter and a million others) Slow Signal 10".
This record is great, this band is no longer. Listen to Infinite Void if you feel a hole in your life that TDS use to fill.
Slow Signal was their first EP, released on Yellow Ghost records.
There are still copies available, but the band broke up not long after the release, and YGR are no longer, so these have been sitting in storage since then.

x

name: SOLD OUT - THE ULTIMATE HIRS PACKAGE!!
description:
AVAILABLE - Wednesday 23rd OCTOBER 7:00pm.

I've made this available for INTERNATIONAL purchase!!!
BE QUICK! Ive been flooded with emails for this stuff!
Watch the ONE BRICK TODAY facebook for the next announcement of package deals!

name: SOLD OUT - SHIT WEATHER shitweather tshirt
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***

Some of these shirts a poorly printed, some are great (mostly they're good)... take a gamble, they're cheap!

Only a few left. Found these tucked away in a box of stuff when I moved states. We were going to get more shirts printed properly soon, but chances are we won't get around to it for some time.

x

name: SOLD OUT - HIRS tshirt
description:
***TO PLACE ORDER OUTSIDE OF AUSTRALIA, PLEASE EMAIL - onelessfortomorrow@gmail.com THANKS!!!***

NO GODS / NO COPS shirt.
Black gidan shirts with white ink.

A small handful of these were printed for the HIRS Australia tour, but sold out at the first show. Missed out and want one??? 
I printed a handful for people who wanted them, but lucky for you, people flaked and so they're still sitting here.
These are the last few that I have left & I won't be re-printing them.
